title: Nine Beautiful Crystals You Can Grow DIY In Your Home
author: Marcia Wendorf
description: Using things you already have in your cupboard, such as sugar and salt, you can grow your own crystals. Come on in and learn how.
cleaned_text: Nine Beautiful Crystals You Can Grow DIY In Your Home With products you already have on hand, you can make homegrown crystals that make unique holiday gifts and beautiful tree decorations. | Nov 17, 2020 12:30 PM EST Created: Nov 17, 2020 12:30 PM EST Updated: May 03, 2023 01:04 AM EST
